london:
Head to **Chat with Local Gossip** in Your Lodgings and ask the Bohemian
Sculptress about a posting with the Foreign Office.

Head to The Foreign Office and work towards a foreign posting. Surely you can
convince them to send you abroad.
Zail to Port Carnelian to begin your term in office.
You're a governor! I'm sure everything is fine and normal.

You've completed a successful term as Governor of Port Carnelian! Again! Again!

*(If you didn't sign on for another term you'll need to return to The Foreign Office first.)*

You've completed multiple terms as Governor of Port Carnelian! 
Can you pull off a state dinner next time?

*(If you didn't sign on for another term you'll need to return to The Foreign Office first.)*
You've held a state dinner in Port Carnelian and been restored to the Empress' Court!
